turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order three three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I would like three medium specialty pizzas with thin crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which specialty pizza did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, for all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you are ordering 3 medium thin crust meat lover pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, goodbye.
